snippet.title: Zombie Army Trilogy - Official Launch Trailer! OUT NOW on PS4, Xbox One and PC!
snippet.description:
Available now for Xbox One, PlayStation 4 and PC, Zombie Army Trilogy marks the apocalyptic conclusion of the cult shooter series.

Priced on consoles at £39.99 / $49.99 / 49.99 euros, Zombie Army Trilogy is now available at a special launch discount of 20% for both Xbox Live Gold subscribers (offer ends March 12th) and Playstation Plus members (ends March 10th in North America, March 12th in other regions).

PC players don’t lose out on the savings either, being able to get three copies for the price of four with an exclusive Steam 4-pack, or 60% off if they own both Nazi Zombie Army games, or 30% for owning one  via Steam.
